channel.title: Updating tor after using proxychains
channel.description: I have not been able to update tor after chainging with socks5 proxy, even after I change back. Tor has ceased to be able to update. Is there any way to remedy this?

item.title: Updating tor after using proxychains
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
“Tor has ceased to be able to update.” is very unclear. What did you do? What was result, output? You mean updating using apt-get is no longer working?

Please see also my signature about reporting bugs.

Read full topic

item.title: Updating tor after using proxychains
item.dc:creator: onionfields
item.description:
I have not been able to update tor after chainging with socks5 proxy, even after I change back. Tor has ceased to be able to update. Is there any way to remedy this?
